summary: the queen 's guard was left red-faced after he slipped on a manhole cover during the popular changing of the guard at buckingham palace last week . he lost his footing on the side of the box and dropping his rifle . the embarrassed soldier is thought to have slipped because of the metal protectors .
aspect: The Queen's Guard slipped and fell on a manhole cover during the Changing of the Guard at Buckingham Palace, leading to an embarrassing moment for the soldier. The incident was captured on camera, and he quickly regained his footing, but was left red-faced after the mishap.
explain: The Queen's Guard slipped and fell on a manhole cover, causing him to lose his rifle and experience an embarrassing moment during a ceremony at Buckingham Palace.
